file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 34-22-01-07 - DISPLAY UNIT - CLEANING/PAINTING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL DISPLAY UNIT - CLEANING/PAINTING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to clean the display units (DU). B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 34-22-01-100-801-A DISPLAY UNIT - CLEANING EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 34-22-01 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-22-01-100-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. DISPLAY UNIT - CLEANING A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to clean the DU display units. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Soft lint-free cloth (100% cotton, inter- To clean the DU glass filter AR available woven pattern flannel) E. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) Commercially available Isopropyl Alcohol AR F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the aircraft is not energized. I. Clean Display Unit SUBTASK 140-002-A (1) To clean the DU, do as follows: (a) Examine the glass filter on the DU for foreign material and variations in optical quality. (b) Remove particles of grit, dirt, or sand from the glass filter of the DU with dry compressed air. (c) Dampen a lint free cloth with isopropyl alcohol. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 34-22-01 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (d) Carefully rub the glass filter of the DU with the lint free cloth until the glass filter is clean. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 34-22-01 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
